VE.Q: What is the flow value from the node Cash Purchase to the node Townhouse?
VE.A: The flow value from the node Cash Purchase to the node Townhouse is {114}.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from the node Urban to the node Cash Purchase?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value from the node Mortgage to the next stage in the sankey chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by node Townhouse?

NF.Q: In the column Location Types of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 111? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Suburban} has an outflow of {122}, {Urban} has an outflow of {259}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Location Types and column Financing Options is the flow between 94 and 190? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {122} from node {Suburban} to {Cash Purchase}, a flow of {100} from node {Urban} to {Mortgage}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 94 and 108? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {100} from node {Urban} to {Mortgage}, a flow of {102} from node {Mortgage} to {Commercial Property}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Suburban to node Cash Purchase and from node Mortgage to node Condo, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Suburban} to node {Cash Purchase} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Suburban to node Cash Purchase, from node Cash Purchase to node Townhouse, and from node Urban to node Cash Purchase, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Urban} to node {Cash Purchase} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Property Types of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Property Types is {Condo}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Suburban to target node Condo? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Suburban to node Condo is: {Suburban, Cash Purchase, Condo}.
